name: Coin Runners by petthecat
description: This is a game called Coin Runner. The point of the game is to get at least 20 coins in 2  min. It is a platformer with collectables, enemies, and spikes. The farther you go away from level the more coins you get. There is a destructible wall somewhere in the level. If you like the game please consider filling out the form in the game and following me on itch.
